document_data.name: Chavyondat
document_data.mainbody:
'''Chavyondat''' was a port city and the capital of [[Estagund]].  It was the largest city in that realm.

Chavyondat was formerly known as '''Klionna'''.
document_data.Geography: Situated on the protective [[Bay of Kings]] on the southern coast of Estagund, Chavyondat was the first line of defense against raiders from [[Dambrath]].
document_data.History: [[Shou Lung]] was working intrigues to establish an enclave—a [[Shou Town]]—in Chavyondat in Estagund in the mid-1370s [[DR]].<ref>{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Eastern Classes}}
document_data.Defenses: Chavyondat was guarded by a corps of skilled crossbowmen and powerful [[illusionist]]s. Additionally, [[Chaka Seltarir]] supplied 10 fully-armed warships to supplement the 5 used by the city.
